instance.name: A Unified Framework for Dopamine Signals across Timescales
instance.citation: Kim, HyungGoo; Malik, Athar; Mikhael, John; Bech, Pol; Tsutsui-Kimura, Iku; Sun, Fangmiao; Zhang, Yajun; Li, Yulong; Watabe-Uchida, Mitsuko; Gershman, Samuel; Uchida, Naoshige (2023) A Unified Framework for Dopamine Signals across Timescales (Version draft) [Data set]. instance.description: This dandiset contains the data associated with "A Unified Framework for Dopamine Signals across Timescales" (Kim et al. 2020). It is comprised of fiber photometry data, single-unit recordings, stimulus variables, and behavioral measurements across a wide variety of experimental manipulations.
